bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Grace Vineyard
review_text: Discreet at first but then slowly blooms into a supple and rich wine. Raspberry and spice aromas open to subtly powerful cherry, dark tea and orange peel flavors that finish with polished tannins. Drink now through 2024. 384 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Jerusalem Hill Vineyard
review_text: Polished and refined, with a silky texture wrapped around an elegant structure, showing rose petal, raspberry, orange zest and tea accents that glide on the long finish. Drink now through 2023. 1,050 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Goodrich
review_text: Distinctly minerally, with a saline quality to the ripe raspberry and cherry flavors, coming together harmoniously against powdery tannins on the long, vivid finish. Exciting, promising a great future. Best from 2017 through 2024. 700 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Strandline
review_text: Taut, focused and vibrant up front, broadening into an open-textured beauty that delivers black cherry, boysenberry, fresh anise and mineral flavors. Shows terrific presence on the finish. Drink now through 2024. 347 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Abbott Claim Vineyard
review_text: Sleek and focused, restrained in style but presenting ripe blueberry, plum and floral flavors that glide into a long, lithe finish. Sleek and deep, lingering with harmony. Drink now through 2024. 400 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Tanager Vineyard
review_text: Supple, focused and expressive, offering blackberry, currant, sassafras and floral flavors wrapped in powdery tannins and gliding into the long, vivid finish. Best from 2018 through 2024. 821 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Pas De Nom
review_text: Firm, with fine tannins under a flowing beam of generous blueberry, currant and floral flavors. Comes together harmoniously on the complete and focused finish. Best from 2018 through 2024. 270 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge
review_text: Broad and spicy, open-textured and generous, with ripe plum and currant flavors, shaded by pepper, sage and coffee notes as the finish sails past fine-grained tannins. Completely harmonious and made to age. Drink now through 2024. 538 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Shea Vineyard
review_text: Polished and elegantly complex, with expressive dark cherry and violet aromas and rich, seamless raspberry, licorice and spice flavors that glide toward refined tannins. Drink now through 2022. 196 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley
review_text: Open-textured and inviting, layering the black cherry, currant, mineral and spice flavors on a polished frame, finishing with generosity and precision without excess weight. Drink now through 2024. 316 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains 3 Clones
review_text: This is sleek and harmonious, open-textured and transparent, letting the raspberry, pomegranate, rose petal and spice flavors dance through the long, inviting finish. Drink now through 2024. 710 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Boulder Bluff Vineyard
review_text: Gently insistent, focused, expansive and detailed, with dark berry and plum notes competing for attention with hints of wet earth and spice, all playing against fine-grained tannins and a supple structure. Drink now through 2024. 504 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Zena Crown Vineyard
review_text: Open-textured and generous, with sassafras-accented black cherry and plum flavors, playing against a light grip of tannins as the finish keeps rolling gently. Has harmony, length and finesse. Drink now through 2024. 303 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Marine Sedimentary
review_text: Polished and elegantly complex, with expressive raspberry and savory tea aromas and supple cherry, crushed stone and white pepper flavors. Drink now through 2024. 810 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Ceras
review_text: Broad and expressive, focusing the blackberry and cherry flavors into an open-textured, transparent beam of red fruit and floral flavors that come together harmoniously on the extended finish. Best from 2018 through 2024. 294 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Looney Vineyard

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Boulder Bluff Vineyard
review_text: Gently insistent, focused, expansive and detailed, with dark berry and plum notes competing for attention with hints of wet earth and spice, all playing against fine-grained tannins and a supple structure. Drink now through 2024. 504 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Zena Crown Vineyard
review_text: Open-textured and generous, with sassafras-accented black cherry and plum flavors, playing against a light grip of tannins as the finish keeps rolling gently. Has harmony, length and finesse. Drink now through 2024. 303 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Marine Sedimentary
review_text: Polished and elegantly complex, with expressive raspberry and savory tea aromas and supple cherry, crushed stone and white pepper flavors. Drink now through 2024. 810 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Ceras
review_text: Broad and expressive, focusing the blackberry and cherry flavors into an open-textured, transparent beam of red fruit and floral flavors that come together harmoniously on the extended finish. Best from 2018 through 2024. 294 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Looney Vineyard
review_text: Graceful and plush, with a rich, complex structure wrapped in expressive black cherry, stony mineral and orange zest flavors. Finishes with a flourish. Drink now through 2020. 323 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Artisan Series Reserve
review_text: Firm and refined, with baby powder–like tannins around the raspberry, strawberry, peach skin and hibiscus notes. Comes together harmoniously on a sleek and transparent frame, finishing long. Best from 2018 through 2024. 7,400 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Dundee Hills
review_text: Lively and expressive, lithe and tangy, with tangerine peel and white tea overtones to the apple and lime flavors, hitting mineral notes as the finish rings true. Drink now through 2022. 270 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills ??? Vineyards
review_text: Firm and focused, this is tightly packed with ripe cherry and smoky mineral accents. The flinty character carries through the long and vivid finish. Needs cellaring to gain flesh. Best from 2018 through 2024. 280 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Zena Crown
review_text: Supple, open-textured and expressive, layering blueberry, plum and savory flavors into a harmonious whole, floating through a long finish against powdery tannins. Has presence and depth. Best from 2018 through 2024. 316 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Willamette Valley Sigrid
review_text: Crisp and vibrant, with minerally quince and floral flavors, finishing on a spicy note. Has presence, complexity and depth, playing mature elements against a youthful structure. Drink now through 2022. 500 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Flat Block
review_text: Ripe and vibrant, open-textured and centered on currant and plum fruit, picking up hints of wet stone and spice as the finish comes together harmoniously. This has presence and depth. Best from 2018 through 2024. 300 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Justice Vineyard

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Pelos Sandberg Vineyard

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Justice Vineyard
review_text: Focused, expressive and refined, layering the generous currant, blackberry. tobacco and dill flavors into a seamless package, rolling gently into a long finish against lightly prickly tannins. Best from 2018 through 2024. 245 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Pelos Sandberg Vineyard
review_text: Supple, expressive and appealing, with density and deft balance, offering rich blueberry and cherry flavors that come together smoothly on the generous finish. Drink now through 2024. 336 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Sunnyside Vineyard
review_text: Sleek and expressive, with complex layers of black cherry and blackberry. Hints of licorice and tar come together harmoniously as the finish gains momentum. Intense but not heavy. Drink now through 2024. 348 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Evelyn's
review_text: Firm and focused, with subtle tiers of cherry, orange peel, floral and dusky spice flavors, coming together harmoniously on the lithe finish. Has presence and depth. Drink now through 2024. 700 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Estate
review_text: Expressive rose petal and black cherry aromas lead to plush and complex raspberry, spice box and dark tea flavors that gain momentum toward polished tannins. Drink now through 2023. 1,620 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Dundee Hills Récolte Grand Cru
review_text: Seamless and refined, with floral pear and spice aromas and supple, layered Meyer lemon, stony mineral and blanched almond flavors that linger. Drink now through 2022. 245 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Aspect
review_text: Impressively combines elegance with sleek complexity, offering expressive violet and raspberry aromas and precise, structured cherry, crushed stone and black tea flavors that gain traction toward refined tannins. Drink now through 2024. 742 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Winery Hill Vineyard
review_text: A lovely, silky wine, with delicate layers of flavor, offering harmonious notes of black cherry, clove and spicy toast that linger. Drink now through 2023. 390 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Mount Richmond
review_text: Firm and focused, with powdery tannins surrounding a sleek core of guava-accented cherry, rose petal and spice flavors that glide into a long, vivid and mineral-marked finish. Has presence and elegance. Best from 2017 through 2024. 1,200 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Roosevelt
review_text: Dark and spicy, sleek and inviting for the black cherry, licorice, tomato leaf and clotted cream notes that come together harmoniously on the expressive finish. Drink now through 2024. 300 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge
review_text: Focused, expressive and layered with currant, plum, mineral and wet earth flavors that play against fine tannins and dance through the open-frame finish. Has presence, depth and persistence. Best from 2018 through 2024. 690 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills La Source Seven Springs Estate
review_text: Firm and focused, with powdery tannins around a lively core of rose petal–infused raspberry and blackberry flavors, gliding into a long and expressive finish marked by minerally notes of wet stone. Best from 2018 through 2024. 1,400 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Antiquum Vineyard
review_text: Plush and expressive, wrapping fine-textured tannins around blueberry, cherry, smoke and spice notes, tumbling easily into a long finish. Drink now through 2022. 110 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Canary Hill Vineyard
review_text: Supple and velvety, with layered flavors of cherry, blueberry, currant and spice set on an open-weave texture. The finish hovers with persistence and point. Drink now through 2024. 1,257 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Shea Vineyard
review_text: Taut and deftly wrought, with pretty mulberry and pomegranate flavors on a transparent frame, veiling the extended finish in delicately peppery tannins. Has presence and persistence. Best from 2018 through 2024. 1,465 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Lazy River Vineyard
review_text: Supple, open-textured and focused, with powdery tannins underlying the cherry and black tea flavors, picking up stony notes as the finish rolls on. Has presence and impressive length. Best from 2017 through 2024. 225 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Reserve
review_text: Thus is open-textured and seamless, offering terrific presence, depth and focus, with layers of blackberry, currant, blueberry and white tea flavors that show hints of sage and sandalwood. The finish gains momentum with each sip. Drink now through 2024. 248 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Justina
review_text: Supple, focused and expressive, layering plum, blackberry, pomegranate and clotted cream flavors on a polished frame, picking up a meaty note on the pulsating, open-textured finish. Drink now through 2024. 158 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge The Beaux Frères Vineyard
review_text: Supple, expressive and multilayered, exhibiting flavors of plum, currant, pomegranate and violet that come together harmoniously, persisting into the long and exceptionally well-balanced finish. Drink now through 2024. 2,405 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Aeolian
review_text: This is aromatically pure, with currant, plum, chocolate, mineral and floral notes mingling effortlessly and continuing into a long and expressive mouthful of open-textured intensity and depth. Shows terrific presence and length. Best from 2017 through 2024. 625 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Dundee Hills Evenstad Reserve
review_text: Focused and expressive, this is layered with wet stone, tangy citrus, pear and green guava flavors that swirl through an expansive finish, gaining momentum and extra dimensions with each sip. Drink now through 2024. 2,000 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Eola-Amity Hills Summum Seven Springs Estate

review_text: Seamless and refined, with floral pear and spice aromas and supple, layered Meyer lemon, stony mineral and blanched almond flavors that linger. Drink now through 2022. 245 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Aspect
review_text: Impressively combines elegance with sleek complexity, offering expressive violet and raspberry aromas and precise, structured cherry, crushed stone and black tea flavors that gain traction toward refined tannins. Drink now through 2024. 742 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Winery Hill Vineyard
review_text: A lovely, silky wine, with delicate layers of flavor, offering harmonious notes of black cherry, clove and spicy toast that linger. Drink now through 2023. 390 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Mount Richmond
review_text: Firm and focused, with powdery tannins surrounding a sleek core of guava-accented cherry, rose petal and spice flavors that glide into a long, vivid and mineral-marked finish. Has presence and elegance. Best from 2017 through 2024. 1,200 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Roosevelt
review_text: Dark and spicy, sleek and inviting for the black cherry, licorice, tomato leaf and clotted cream notes that come together harmoniously on the expressive finish. Drink now through 2024. 300 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge
review_text: Focused, expressive and layered with currant, plum, mineral and wet earth flavors that play against fine tannins and dance through the open-frame finish. Has presence, depth and persistence. Best from 2018 through 2024. 690 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills La Source Seven Springs Estate
review_text: Firm and focused, with powdery tannins around a lively core of rose petal–infused raspberry and blackberry flavors, gliding into a long and expressive finish marked by minerally notes of wet stone. Best from 2018 through 2024. 1,400 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Antiquum Vineyard
review_text: Plush and expressive, wrapping fine-textured tannins around blueberry, cherry, smoke and spice notes, tumbling easily into a long finish. Drink now through 2022. 110 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Canary Hill Vineyard
review_text: Supple and velvety, with layered flavors of cherry, blueberry, currant and spice set on an open-weave texture. The finish hovers with persistence and point. Drink now through 2024. 1,257 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Shea Vineyard
review_text: Taut and deftly wrought, with pretty mulberry and pomegranate flavors on a transparent frame, veiling the extended finish in delicately peppery tannins. Has presence and persistence. Best from 2018 through 2024. 1,465 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Lazy River Vineyard
review_text: Supple, open-textured and focused, with powdery tannins underlying the cherry and black tea flavors, picking up stony notes as the finish rolls on. Has presence and impressive length. Best from 2017 through 2024. 225 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Reserve
review_text: Thus is open-textured and seamless, offering terrific presence, depth and focus, with layers of blackberry, currant, blueberry and white tea flavors that show hints of sage and sandalwood. The finish gains momentum with each sip. Drink now through 2024. 248 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Justina
review_text: Supple, focused and expressive, layering plum, blackberry, pomegranate and clotted cream flavors on a polished frame, picking up a meaty note on the pulsating, open-textured finish. Drink now through 2024. 158 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge The Beaux Frères Vineyard
review_text: Supple, expressive and multilayered, exhibiting flavors of plum, currant, pomegranate and violet that come together harmoniously, persisting into the long and exceptionally well-balanced finish. Drink now through 2024. 2,405 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Aeolian
review_text: This is aromatically pure, with currant, plum, chocolate, mineral and floral notes mingling effortlessly and continuing into a long and expressive mouthful of open-textured intensity and depth. Shows terrific presence and length. Best from 2017 through 2024. 625 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Dundee Hills Evenstad Reserve
review_text: Focused and expressive, this is layered with wet stone, tangy citrus, pear and green guava flavors that swirl through an expansive finish, gaining momentum and extra dimensions with each sip. Drink now through 2024. 2,000 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Eola-Amity Hills Summum Seven Springs Estate
review_text: Taut, minerally and deftly balanced, this poised style delivers beautifully defined pear, river stone, floral and lime flavors, showing distinction and presence. Drink now through 2024. 400 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Winderlea Vineyard
review_text: Vital and open-textured, serving up rich blackberry, cherry and spice flavors, with transparency and verve. Finishes with refreshing weightlessness. Drink now through 2024. 146 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Arcus Estate
review_text: Focused and generous, with ripe flavors on a taut frame, offering black cherry and smoky notes and mineral accents that linger harmoniously. Has a certain majesty as the finish persists. Best from 2018 through 2024. 1,320 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Cuvée 59 Beaux Frères Vineyard
review_text: Supple, open-textured and seductive, with gorgeous plum and red currant flavors set on a polished frame, floating easily over velvety tannins on the precise, focused finish. Best from 2018 through 2024. 488 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge The Upper Terrace
review_text: Supple, velvety, focused and distinctive, with smoky, minerally accents around a core of cherry, raspberry and blueberry fruit. Finishes with presence and persistence on an open texture. Drink now through 2024. 1,260 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Le Pré Du Col Vineyard
review_text: Expressive, rich and complex, layering blueberry, cherry and plum flavors with savory spice and cedar notes, with fine-powder tannins lifting the long finish. Best from 2018 through 2024. 500 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Gregory Ranch
review_text: Broad and spicy, with pepper, white chocolate and bay leaf overtones to the rich cherry and raspberry fruit. Glides into a generous and open-textured finish. Drink now through 2024. 500 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Grace Vineyard
review_text: Discreet at first but then slowly blooms into a supple and rich wine. Raspberry and spice aromas open to subtly powerful cherry, dark tea and orange peel flavors that finish with polished tannins. Drink now through 2024. 384 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Jerusalem Hill Vineyard
review_text: Polished and refined, with a silky texture wrapped around an elegant structure, showing rose petal, raspberry, orange zest and tea accents that glide on the long finish. Drink now through 2023. 1,050 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Goodrich
review_text: Distinctly minerally, with a saline quality to the ripe raspberry and cherry flavors, coming together harmoniously against powdery tannins on the long, vivid finish. Exciting, promising a great future. Best from 2017 through 2024. 700 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Strandline
review_text: Taut, focused and vibrant up front, broadening into an open-textured beauty that delivers black cherry, boysenberry, fresh anise and mineral flavors. Shows terrific presence on the finish. Drink now through 2024. 347 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Abbott Claim Vineyard
review_text: Sleek and focused, restrained in style but presenting ripe blueberry, plum and floral flavors that glide into a long, lithe finish. Sleek and deep, lingering with harmony. Drink now through 2024. 400 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Tanager Vineyard
review_text: Supple, focused and expressive, offering blackberry, currant, sassafras and floral flavors wrapped in powdery tannins and gliding into the long, vivid finish. Best from 2018 through 2024. 821 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Pas De Nom
review_text: Firm, with fine tannins under a flowing beam of generous blueberry, currant and floral flavors. Comes together harmoniously on the complete and focused finish. Best from 2018 through 2024. 270 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge
review_text: Broad and spicy, open-textured and generous, with ripe plum and currant flavors, shaded by pepper, sage and coffee notes as the finish sails past fine-grained tannins. Completely harmonious and made to age. Drink now through 2024. 538 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Shea Vineyard
review_text: Polished and elegantly complex, with expressive dark cherry and violet aromas and rich, seamless raspberry, licorice and spice flavors that glide toward refined tannins. Drink now through 2022. 196 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley
review_text: Open-textured and inviting, layering the black cherry, currant, mineral and spice flavors on a polished frame, finishing with generosity and precision without excess weight. Drink now through 2024. 316 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains 3 Clones
review_text: This is sleek and harmonious, open-textured and transparent, letting the raspberry, pomegranate, rose petal and spice flavors dance through the long, inviting finish. Drink now through 2024. 710 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Boulder Bluff Vineyard
review_text: Gently insistent, focused, expansive and detailed, with dark berry and plum notes competing for attention with hints of wet earth and spice, all playing against fine-grained tannins and a supple structure. Drink now through 2024. 504 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Zena Crown Vineyard
review_text: Open-textured and generous, with sassafras-accented black cherry and plum flavors, playing against a light grip of tannins as the finish keeps rolling gently. Has harmony, length and finesse. Drink now through 2024. 303 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Marine Sedimentary
review_text: Polished and elegantly complex, with expressive raspberry and savory tea aromas and supple cherry, crushed stone and white pepper flavors. Drink now through 2024. 810 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Ceras
review_text: Broad and expressive, focusing the blackberry and cherry flavors into an open-textured, transparent beam of red fruit and floral flavors that come together harmoniously on the extended finish. Best from 2018 through 2024. 294 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Looney Vineyard
review_text: Graceful and plush, with a rich, complex structure wrapped in expressive black cherry, stony mineral and orange zest flavors. Finishes with a flourish. Drink now through 2020. 323 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Artisan Series Reserve
review_text: Firm and refined, with baby powder–like tannins around the raspberry, strawberry, peach skin and hibiscus notes. Comes together harmoniously on a sleek and transparent frame, finishing long. Best from 2018 through 2024. 7,400 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Dundee Hills
review_text: Lively and expressive, lithe and tangy, with tangerine peel and white tea overtones to the apple and lime flavors, hitting mineral notes as the finish rings true. Drink now through 2022. 270 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills ??? Vineyards
review_text: Firm and focused, this is tightly packed with ripe cherry and smoky mineral accents. The flinty character carries through the long and vivid finish. Needs cellaring to gain flesh. Best from 2018 through 2024. 280 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Zena Crown
review_text: Supple, open-textured and expressive, layering blueberry, plum and savory flavors into a harmonious whole, floating through a long finish against powdery tannins. Has presence and depth. Best from 2018 through 2024. 316 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Willamette Valley Sigrid
review_text: Crisp and vibrant, with minerally quince and floral flavors, finishing on a spicy note. Has presence, complexity and depth, playing mature elements against a youthful structure. Drink now through 2022. 500 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Flat Block
review_text: Ripe and vibrant, open-textured and centered on currant and plum fruit, picking up hints of wet stone and spice as the finish comes together harmoniously. This has presence and depth. Best from 2018 through 2024. 300 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Justice Vineyard
review_text: Focused, expressive and refined, layering the generous currant, blackberry. tobacco and dill flavors into a seamless package, rolling gently into a long finish against lightly prickly tannins. Best from 2018 through 2024. 245 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Pelos Sandberg Vineyard
review_text: Supple, expressive and appealing, with density and deft balance, offering rich blueberry and cherry flavors that come together smoothly on the generous finish. Drink now through 2024. 336 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Sunnyside Vineyard
review_text: Sleek and expressive, with complex layers of black cherry and blackberry. Hints of licorice and tar come together harmoniously as the finish gains momentum. Intense but not heavy. Drink now through 2024. 348 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Evelyn's
review_text: Firm and focused, with subtle tiers of cherry, orange peel, floral and dusky spice flavors, coming together harmoniously on the lithe finish. Has presence and depth. Drink now through 2024. 700 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Estate
review_text: Expressive rose petal and black cherry aromas lead to plush and complex raspberry, spice box and dark tea flavors that gain momentum toward polished tannins. Drink now through 2023. 1,620 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Dundee Hills Récolte Grand Cru
review_text: Seamless and refined, with floral pear and spice aromas and supple, layered Meyer lemon, stony mineral and blanched almond flavors that linger. Drink now through 2022. 245 cases made.

review_text: Impressively combines elegance with sleek complexity, offering expressive violet and raspberry aromas and precise, structured cherry, crushed stone and black tea flavors that gain traction toward refined tannins. Drink now through 2024. 742 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Winery Hill Vineyard
review_text: A lovely, silky wine, with delicate layers of flavor, offering harmonious notes of black cherry, clove and spicy toast that linger. Drink now through 2023. 390 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Mount Richmond
review_text: Firm and focused, with powdery tannins surrounding a sleek core of guava-accented cherry, rose petal and spice flavors that glide into a long, vivid and mineral-marked finish. Has presence and elegance. Best from 2017 through 2024. 1,200 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Roosevelt
review_text: Dark and spicy, sleek and inviting for the black cherry, licorice, tomato leaf and clotted cream notes that come together harmoniously on the expressive finish. Drink now through 2024. 300 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge
review_text: Focused, expressive and layered with currant, plum, mineral and wet earth flavors that play against fine tannins and dance through the open-frame finish. Has presence, depth and persistence. Best from 2018 through 2024. 690 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills La Source Seven Springs Estate
review_text: Firm and focused, with powdery tannins around a lively core of rose petal–infused raspberry and blackberry flavors, gliding into a long and expressive finish marked by minerally notes of wet stone. Best from 2018 through 2024. 1,400 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Antiquum Vineyard
review_text: Plush and expressive, wrapping fine-textured tannins around blueberry, cherry, smoke and spice notes, tumbling easily into a long finish. Drink now through 2022. 110 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Canary Hill Vineyard
review_text: Supple and velvety, with layered flavors of cherry, blueberry, currant and spice set on an open-weave texture. The finish hovers with persistence and point. Drink now through 2024. 1,257 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Shea Vineyard
review_text: Taut and deftly wrought, with pretty mulberry and pomegranate flavors on a transparent frame, veiling the extended finish in delicately peppery tannins. Has presence and persistence. Best from 2018 through 2024. 1,465 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Lazy River Vineyard
review_text: Supple, open-textured and focused, with powdery tannins underlying the cherry and black tea flavors, picking up stony notes as the finish rolls on. Has presence and impressive length. Best from 2017 through 2024. 225 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge The Upper Terrace
review_text: Intensely and seductively aromatic, billowing purple plum, blueberry, blackberry and espresso notes that resolve on the velvety palate. The tension between the fruity and savory character persists into the long and vivid finish. Drink now through 2023. 366 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge The Beaux Frères Vineyard
review_text: With a delicate and open texture, this shows lanolin and rose petal undertones to the red berry flavors. Gains depth with each sip.—Non-blind Beaux Frères vertical (October 2015). Drink now through 2025. 2,167 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Le Pré Du Col Vineyard
review_text: Supple, seductive and distinctive, with pure blueberry fruit, shaded with white pepper, pear skin and floral character. The flavors dance merrily into the long, deftly balanced finish. Offers presence and intensity without extra weight. Drink now through 2023. 1,500 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard Summum
review_text: Taut, focused and juicy, with lemon, lemon verbena and mineral overtones to the lithe, lively, open-textured pear and apple flavors, which linger expressively as the finish floats on. Drink now through 2023. 288 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Ceras
review_text: Sleek, transparent and immensely appealing, with an open texture, delicate structure and harmony, persisting on the finish, displaying dark berry, orange peel, black tea and loamy earth complexity. The finish sails on. Drink now through 2023. 949 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Dundee Hills
review_text: Broad, open-textured and layered, with pear, grapefruit, quince and spice flavors that just don't quit as the tangy finish sails on. Has depth and distinctiveness. Drink now through 2021. 225 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Sunnyside Vineyard
review_text: This is supple, complex and harmonious, weaving together savory spice and autumn leaf overtones with ripe currant and black plum flavors. Open-textured and seductive, this unfurls gracefully through the long finish. Drink now through 2023. 211 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard La Source
review_text: Taut, focused, complex and immediately inviting, deftly layering pear, nectarine, citrus, loamy earth and floral aromas and flavors as the finish plays on. Shows good tension between the fruit and savory notes. Drink now through 2023. 390 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills ∑ Single Vineyard
review_text: Light and zingy, dripping with gorgeous raspberry, strawberry and floral flavors, weaving in strong mineral notes as the finish gains momentum. A hint of pepper informs the aftertaste. Drink now through 2023. 302 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Willamette Valley Aurata
review_text: Focused, showing tremendous presence, with a bright beam of pear, honey, spice and floral notes that pierces the supple texture and persists into a long and expressive finish. Drink now through 2021. 160 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Antikythera
review_text: Supple, silky and generous, with blueberry and cherry flavors. A streak of tomato leaf weaves through the transparent finish, wrapped in pillowy tannins. Drink now through 2023. 310 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Botanica
review_text: Sleek and expressive, light-footed but dark-fruited, with currant and blackberry flavors standing up to the fine tannins, black tea hints and savory notes as the finish lingers. Shows more density than most from 2013. Drink now through 2020. 519 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Estate Vineyard
review_text: Fresh, open and expressive, this offers a lively mix of cherry, raspberry, cinnamon and fresh toast flavors that mingle harmoniously on a long, detailed finish. The nubby tannins are well-integrated. Drink now through 2023. 400 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Winery Block
review_text: Open-textured, ripe and generous, delivering a range of cherry, blackberry, coffee and spice flavors that float over a thin layer of crisp tannins and persist enticingly on the finish. Best from 2017 through 2023. 225 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Bergström Vineyard
review_text: Refreshing, polished and juicy, with orange peel–accented black cherry and floral flavors, showing hints of pepper and clove. Dances against a glassy texture and lingers enticingly. The finish exhibits pizzazz and grace. Drink now through 2023. 1,200 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Les Dijonnais
review_text: Fresh and expressive, soft in texture, this offers generous flavors of cherry, raspberry and clove that linger effortlessly against velvety tannins. Drink now through 2023. 517 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley The Last Chapter
review_text: Crisp and focused, with a slight minty edge accenting the raspberry and red plum flavors, lingering on the sleek, open-textured finish. Drink now through 2020. 500 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills
review_text: Focused, light, lively and savory, with distinctive mineral notes coursing through the cherry and raspberry flavors, persisting on the finish with finesse and flair. Drink now through 2023. 1,488 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Dundee Hills Clos de Lune Vineyard
review_text: Bright and generous, with complex flavors of nectarine, grapefruit, pear and flowers that swirl together harmoniously on the long and vivid finish. Keeps sailing along after the final sip. Drink now through 2020. 120 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Fleur de Lis Vineyard
review_text: Supple and open-textured, with layers of blackberry, cherry and licorice flavors, accented by hints of pepper and tea leaf. Comes together harmoniously and intensely on the polished finish. Has presence and persistence. Drink now through 2024. 169 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard La Source
review_text: Fresh and inviting, open-textured and appealing, with cherry, floral and mineral flavors gliding smoothly into a harmonious finish. Has terrific presence, depth and persistence. Drink now through 2021. 850 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains La Quercia Block
review_text: Polished, refined and light-footed, but packed with blackberry, black olive and rose petal flavors, persisting against a meaty note as the finish lingers expressively. Drink now through 2023. 300 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Carter Vineyard
review_text: Endowed with layers of ripe plum, dark berry, dried flowers and savory, meaty nuances, this medium-weight wine has tremendous presence and harmony, right through the long and expressive finish. Best from 2017 through 2023. 1,092 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Lorna-Marie
review_text: Polished, showing a velvety texture to the deftly restrained black currant, plum, smoke and spice flavors, coming together harmoniously with a minerally streak on the precise finish. Drink now through 2023. 170 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Reserve
review_text: Fresh, focused and open-textured, layering plum, currant and crème fraîche flavors with the utmost delicacy. A light nudge of tannins underlines the impressively persistent finish. Drink now through 2023. 1,250 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Vigneto Bieze Vineyard
review_text: Bright and juicy, with tangy grapefruit notes that mingle harmoniously with the vivid cherry and raspberry flavors at the core, gliding into a polished and extended finish. Drink now through 2023. 90 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Stoller Vineyard
review_text: Light, lithe and seductively supple, with pure cherry and blackberry flavors at the center, gliding into an open texture that adds glints of pear and jasmine as the finish lingers easily. Drink now through 2022. 460 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Résonance Vineyard
review_text: Light and focused, showing distinctive subtlety. A layer of crinkly tannins underlies a pulsing core of mineral-accented cherry and red berry flavors, hinting at cinnamon as the finish lingers gently. Best from 2017 through 2023. 2,000 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Wits' End Vineyard
review_text: Fresh and vital, with crisp tannins around a generous core of black cherry, cassis and floral notes that come together harmoniously on the long and expressive finish. Best from 2017 through 2023. 322 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Ribbon Ridge Estate
review_text: Offers great presence, unfurling the blueberry, currant, plum and spice flavors on a sleek, narrowly focused frame. Finishes with snap and persistence. Drink now through 2023. 453 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Block 14 Single Vineyard
review_text: Sleek and inviting, polished and deep, with cherry, cinnamon, clove and mineral flavors that meld seamlessly and keep singing on the long and expressive finish. Drink now through 2023. 81 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Slope Single Vineyard
review_text: Rich and expressive, featuring black cherry and pepper notes set against tangy mineral flavors. Comes together smoothly as the finish gains traction, with a light bite of tannins. Drink now through 2023. 348 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Nicholas Vineyard
review_text: Supple, open-textured and inviting, with plum and currant fruit riding serenely over fine, nubby tannins and picking up black tea and pear flavors as the finish lingers. Drink now through 2023. 188 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Willamette Valley Terroir Selection
review_text: Supple, open-textured and harmonious, with orange peel–tinged pear and floral flavors on a generous frame, dancing lightly through the finish. Drink now through 2020. 1,589 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Twelve Oaks Estate
review_text: Open-textured, refreshing and distinctive, with soft-spoken black cherry, dark plum, leather and espresso flavors that come together harmoniously and gain momentum as the finish sails on. Drink now through 2023. 490 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Zena Crown
review_text: Supple, velvety and generous, layering blackberry, plum, licorice, pepper and floral flavors into an open-textured finish that lets the flavors keep singing harmoniously. Best from 2017 through 2023. 213 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley
review_text: Soft and supple, plush in texture, this open-weave style offers blueberry, red plum and thyme notes, blossoming with gentle insistence. The tannins are nicely absorbed. Drink now through 2023. 2,606 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Willamette Valley Sigrid
review_text: Generous and expressive on a frame that floats nicely, offering apricot-scented pear and spice flavors that pick up toasty notes as the finish lingers. Drink now through 2020. 1,100 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Silice
review_text: Firm in texture, this lithe bundle of black cherry, raspberry, espresso and smoke flavors comes together with integrity on the harmonious finish. Needs time to soften the tannins. Best from 2018 through 2023. 1,600 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Temperance Hill Vineyard
review_text: Light and sleek, playing cherry and blueberry flavors against a polished texture that lets the finish gain momentum and persist impressively. A classic example of getting the most out of a light vintage. Drink now through 2021. 290 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Pelos Sandberg Vineyard
review_text: Fresh and sleek, with nubby tannins underlying the cherry and blueberry flavors, mingling harmoniously as the finish lingers. Drink now through 2022. 303 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Edward
review_text: Supple, complex and complete, with a harmonious array of cherry, orange peel, black tea and gentle spice flavors that come together smoothly against refined tannins on the long finish. Drink now through 2021. 100 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Cuvée du Tonnelier
review_text: Vibrant, focused, open-textured and distinctive, with savory elements weaving through the cherry and crème fraîche flavors, extending smoothly into a long finish. Best from 2017 through 2023. 570 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Ridgecrest Vineyards
review_text: Bright and lively, polished in texture and light-footed, with currant and plum flavors on a sleek frame, lingering effortlessly. Drink now through 2023. 440 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Ridgecrest Vineyards Reserve
review_text: Bright, crisp, tangy and appealing, showing transparency and vibrant raspberry and strawberry flavors, layered with hints of mint and thyme blossom. Finishes with vivid presence. Drink now through 2021. 430 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Willamette Valley
review_text: Supple, expressive and elegant, with polished texture to the relatively light but intense pear, pepper and fresh cream flavors, lingering effectively. Has depth and presence. Drink now through 2018. 50 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Dundee Hills Récolte Grand Cru
review_text: Open-textured, broad and expressive, with zingy citrus and silvery tinges to the pear and mineral flavors, lingering on the zippy finish. Drink now through 2021. 257 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Grace Vineyard
review_text: Supple and generous, this is light-footed, with black cherry, orange peel, tea and spice flavors set against well-mannered tannins. Persistent on the long finish. Best from 2018 through 2023. 321 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Leland
review_text: Refined, with an open texture to the delicately precise red plum, raspberry, white chocolate and floral flavors, gliding elegantly into a long and expressive finish. Has presence and impressive length. Drink now through 2023. 554 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard
review_text: Crisp and tangy, with a mineral character running through the raspberry and cherry flavors at the core, coming together with harmony and structural tension on the vibrant finish. Best from 2017 through 2023. 3,054 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge The Upper Terrace
review_text: Intensely and seductively aromatic, billowing purple plum, blueberry, blackberry and espresso notes that resolve on the velvety palate. The tension between the fruity and savory character persists into the long and vivid finish. Drink now through 2023. 366 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge The Beaux Frères Vineyard
review_text: With a delicate and open texture, this shows lanolin and rose petal undertones to the red berry flavors. Gains depth with each sip.—Non-blind Beaux Frères vertical (October 2015). Drink now through 2025. 2,167 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Le Pré Du Col Vineyard
review_text: Supple, seductive and distinctive, with pure blueberry fruit, shaded with white pepper, pear skin and floral character. The flavors dance merrily into the long, deftly balanced finish. Offers presence and intensity without extra weight. Drink now through 2023. 1,500 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard Summum
review_text: Taut, focused and juicy, with lemon, lemon verbena and mineral overtones to the lithe, lively, open-textured pear and apple flavors, which linger expressively as the finish floats on. Drink now through 2023. 288 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Ceras
review_text: Sleek, transparent and immensely appealing, with an open texture, delicate structure and harmony, persisting on the finish, displaying dark berry, orange peel, black tea and loamy earth complexity. The finish sails on. Drink now through 2023. 949 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Dundee Hills
review_text: Broad, open-textured and layered, with pear, grapefruit, quince and spice flavors that just don't quit as the tangy finish sails on. Has depth and distinctiveness. Drink now through 2021. 225 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Sunnyside Vineyard
review_text: This is supple, complex and harmonious, weaving together savory spice and autumn leaf overtones with ripe currant and black plum flavors. Open-textured and seductive, this unfurls gracefully through the long finish. Drink now through 2023. 211 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard La Source
review_text: Taut, focused, complex and immediately inviting, deftly layering pear, nectarine, citrus, loamy earth and floral aromas and flavors as the finish plays on. Shows good tension between the fruit and savory notes. Drink now through 2023. 390 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills ∑ Single Vineyard
review_text: Light and zingy, dripping with gorgeous raspberry, strawberry and floral flavors, weaving in strong mineral notes as the finish gains momentum. A hint of pepper informs the aftertaste. Drink now through 2023. 302 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Willamette Valley Aurata
review_text: Focused, showing tremendous presence, with a bright beam of pear, honey, spice and floral notes that pierces the supple texture and persists into a long and expressive finish. Drink now through 2021. 160 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Antikythera
review_text: Supple, silky and generous, with blueberry and cherry flavors. A streak of tomato leaf weaves through the transparent finish, wrapped in pillowy tannins. Drink now through 2023. 310 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Botanica
review_text: Sleek and expressive, light-footed but dark-fruited, with currant and blackberry flavors standing up to the fine tannins, black tea hints and savory notes as the finish lingers. Shows more density than most from 2013. Drink now through 2020. 519 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Estate Vineyard
review_text: Fresh, open and expressive, this offers a lively mix of cherry, raspberry, cinnamon and fresh toast flavors that mingle harmoniously on a long, detailed finish. The nubby tannins are well-integrated. Drink now through 2023. 400 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Winery Block
review_text: Open-textured, ripe and generous, delivering a range of cherry, blackberry, coffee and spice flavors that float over a thin layer of crisp tannins and persist enticingly on the finish. Best from 2017 through 2023. 225 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Bergström Vineyard
review_text: Refreshing, polished and juicy, with orange peel–accented black cherry and floral flavors, showing hints of pepper and clove. Dances against a glassy texture and lingers enticingly. The finish exhibits pizzazz and grace. Drink now through 2023. 1,200 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Les Dijonnais
review_text: Fresh and expressive, soft in texture, this offers generous flavors of cherry, raspberry and clove that linger effortlessly against velvety tannins. Drink now through 2023. 517 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley The Last Chapter
review_text: Crisp and focused, with a slight minty edge accenting the raspberry and red plum flavors, lingering on the sleek, open-textured finish. Drink now through 2020. 500 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills
review_text: Focused, light, lively and savory, with distinctive mineral notes coursing through the cherry and raspberry flavors, persisting on the finish with finesse and flair. Drink now through 2023. 1,488 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Dundee Hills Clos de Lune Vineyard
review_text: Bright and generous, with complex flavors of nectarine, grapefruit, pear and flowers that swirl together harmoniously on the long and vivid finish. Keeps sailing along after the final sip. Drink now through 2020. 120 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Fleur de Lis Vineyard
review_text: Supple and open-textured, with layers of blackberry, cherry and licorice flavors, accented by hints of pepper and tea leaf. Comes together harmoniously and intensely on the polished finish. Has presence and persistence. Drink now through 2024. 169 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard La Source
review_text: Fresh and inviting, open-textured and appealing, with cherry, floral and mineral flavors gliding smoothly into a harmonious finish. Has terrific presence, depth and persistence. Drink now through 2021. 850 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard
review_text: Crisp and tangy, with a mineral character running through the raspberry and cherry flavors at the core, coming together with harmony and structural tension on the vibrant finish. Best from 2017 through 2023. 3,054 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge The Upper Terrace
review_text: Intensely and seductively aromatic, billowing purple plum, blueberry, blackberry and espresso notes that resolve on the velvety palate. The tension between the fruity and savory character persists into the long and vivid finish. Drink now through 2023. 366 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge The Beaux Frères Vineyard
review_text: With a delicate and open texture, this shows lanolin and rose petal undertones to the red berry flavors. Gains depth with each sip.—Non-blind Beaux Frères vertical (October 2015). Drink now through 2025. 2,167 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Le Pré Du Col Vineyard
review_text: Supple, seductive and distinctive, with pure blueberry fruit, shaded with white pepper, pear skin and floral character. The flavors dance merrily into the long, deftly balanced finish. Offers presence and intensity without extra weight. Drink now through 2023. 1,500 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard Summum
review_text: Taut, focused and juicy, with lemon, lemon verbena and mineral overtones to the lithe, lively, open-textured pear and apple flavors, which linger expressively as the finish floats on. Drink now through 2023. 288 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Ceras
review_text: Sleek, transparent and immensely appealing, with an open texture, delicate structure and harmony, persisting on the finish, displaying dark berry, orange peel, black tea and loamy earth complexity. The finish sails on. Drink now through 2023. 949 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Dundee Hills
review_text: Broad, open-textured and layered, with pear, grapefruit, quince and spice flavors that just don't quit as the tangy finish sails on. Has depth and distinctiveness. Drink now through 2021. 225 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Sunnyside Vineyard
review_text: This is supple, complex and harmonious, weaving together savory spice and autumn leaf overtones with ripe currant and black plum flavors. Open-textured and seductive, this unfurls gracefully through the long finish. Drink now through 2023. 211 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard La Source
review_text: Taut, focused, complex and immediately inviting, deftly layering pear, nectarine, citrus, loamy earth and floral aromas and flavors as the finish plays on. Shows good tension between the fruit and savory notes. Drink now through 2023. 390 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills ∑ Single Vineyard
review_text: Light and zingy, dripping with gorgeous raspberry, strawberry and floral flavors, weaving in strong mineral notes as the finish gains momentum. A hint of pepper informs the aftertaste. Drink now through 2023. 302 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Willamette Valley Aurata
review_text: Focused, showing tremendous presence, with a bright beam of pear, honey, spice and floral notes that pierces the supple texture and persists into a long and expressive finish. Drink now through 2021. 160 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Antikythera
review_text: Supple, silky and generous, with blueberry and cherry flavors. A streak of tomato leaf weaves through the transparent finish, wrapped in pillowy tannins. Drink now through 2023. 310 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Botanica
review_text: Sleek and expressive, light-footed but dark-fruited, with currant and blackberry flavors standing up to the fine tannins, black tea hints and savory notes as the finish lingers. Shows more density than most from 2013. Drink now through 2020. 519 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Estate Vineyard
review_text: Fresh, open and expressive, this offers a lively mix of cherry, raspberry, cinnamon and fresh toast flavors that mingle harmoniously on a long, detailed finish. The nubby tannins are well-integrated. Drink now through 2023. 400 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Winery Block
review_text: Open-textured, ripe and generous, delivering a range of cherry, blackberry, coffee and spice flavors that float over a thin layer of crisp tannins and persist enticingly on the finish. Best from 2017 through 2023. 225 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Bergström Vineyard
review_text: Refreshing, polished and juicy, with orange peel–accented black cherry and floral flavors, showing hints of pepper and clove. Dances against a glassy texture and lingers enticingly. The finish exhibits pizzazz and grace. Drink now through 2023. 1,200 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Les Dijonnais
review_text: Fresh and expressive, soft in texture, this offers generous flavors of cherry, raspberry and clove that linger effortlessly against velvety tannins. Drink now through 2023. 517 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley The Last Chapter
review_text: Crisp and focused, with a slight minty edge accenting the raspberry and red plum flavors, lingering on the sleek, open-textured finish. Drink now through 2020. 500 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills
review_text: Focused, light, lively and savory, with distinctive mineral notes coursing through the cherry and raspberry flavors, persisting on the finish with finesse and flair. Drink now through 2023. 1,488 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Dundee Hills Clos de Lune Vineyard
review_text: Bright and generous, with complex flavors of nectarine, grapefruit, pear and flowers that swirl together harmoniously on the long and vivid finish. Keeps sailing along after the final sip. Drink now through 2020. 120 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Fleur de Lis Vineyard
review_text: Supple and open-textured, with layers of blackberry, cherry and licorice flavors, accented by hints of pepper and tea leaf. Comes together harmoniously and intensely on the polished finish. Has presence and persistence. Drink now through 2024. 169 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard La Source
review_text: Fresh and inviting, open-textured and appealing, with cherry, floral and mineral flavors gliding smoothly into a harmonious finish. Has terrific presence, depth and persistence. Drink now through 2021. 850 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains La Quercia Block
review_text: Polished, refined and light-footed, but packed with blackberry, black olive and rose petal flavors, persisting against a meaty note as the finish lingers expressively. Drink now through 2023. 300 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Reserve
review_text: Fresh, focused and open-textured, layering plum, currant and crème fraîche flavors with the utmost delicacy. A light nudge of tannins underlines the impressively persistent finish. Drink now through 2023. 1,250 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Vigneto Bieze Vineyard

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Wits' End Vineyard

bottle_name: Chardonnay Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard Summum
review_text: Taut, focused and juicy, with lemon, lemon verbena and mineral overtones to the lithe, lively, open-textured pear and apple flavors, which linger expressively as the finish floats on. Drink now through 2023. 288 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Ceras
review_text: Sleek, transparent and immensely appealing, with an open texture, delicate structure and harmony, persisting on the finish, displaying dark berry, orange peel, black tea and loamy earth complexity. The finish sails on. Drink now through 2023. 949 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Dundee Hills
review_text: Broad, open-textured and layered, with pear, grapefruit, quince and spice flavors that just don't quit as the tangy finish sails on. Has depth and distinctiveness. Drink now through 2021. 225 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Sunnyside Vineyard
review_text: This is supple, complex and harmonious, weaving together savory spice and autumn leaf overtones with ripe currant and black plum flavors. Open-textured and seductive, this unfurls gracefully through the long finish. Drink now through 2023. 211 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard La Source
review_text: Taut, focused, complex and immediately inviting, deftly layering pear, nectarine, citrus, loamy earth and floral aromas and flavors as the finish plays on. Shows good tension between the fruit and savory notes. Drink now through 2023. 390 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills ∑ Single Vineyard
review_text: Light and zingy, dripping with gorgeous raspberry, strawberry and floral flavors, weaving in strong mineral notes as the finish gains momentum. A hint of pepper informs the aftertaste. Drink now through 2023. 302 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Willamette Valley Aurata
review_text: Focused, showing tremendous presence, with a bright beam of pear, honey, spice and floral notes that pierces the supple texture and persists into a long and expressive finish. Drink now through 2021. 160 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Antikythera
review_text: Supple, silky and generous, with blueberry and cherry flavors. A streak of tomato leaf weaves through the transparent finish, wrapped in pillowy tannins. Drink now through 2023. 310 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Botanica
review_text: Sleek and expressive, light-footed but dark-fruited, with currant and blackberry flavors standing up to the fine tannins, black tea hints and savory notes as the finish lingers. Shows more density than most from 2013. Drink now through 2020. 519 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Estate Vineyard
review_text: Fresh, open and expressive, this offers a lively mix of cherry, raspberry, cinnamon and fresh toast flavors that mingle harmoniously on a long, detailed finish. The nubby tannins are well-integrated. Drink now through 2023. 400 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Winery Block
review_text: Open-textured, ripe and generous, delivering a range of cherry, blackberry, coffee and spice flavors that float over a thin layer of crisp tannins and persist enticingly on the finish. Best from 2017 through 2023. 225 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Bergström Vineyard
review_text: Refreshing, polished and juicy, with orange peel–accented black cherry and floral flavors, showing hints of pepper and clove. Dances against a glassy texture and lingers enticingly. The finish exhibits pizzazz and grace. Drink now through 2023. 1,200 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Les Dijonnais
review_text: Fresh and expressive, soft in texture, this offers generous flavors of cherry, raspberry and clove that linger effortlessly against velvety tannins. Drink now through 2023. 517 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley The Last Chapter
review_text: Crisp and focused, with a slight minty edge accenting the raspberry and red plum flavors, lingering on the sleek, open-textured finish. Drink now through 2020. 500 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills
review_text: Focused, light, lively and savory, with distinctive mineral notes coursing through the cherry and raspberry flavors, persisting on the finish with finesse and flair. Drink now through 2023. 1,488 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Dundee Hills Clos de Lune Vineyard
review_text: Bright and generous, with complex flavors of nectarine, grapefruit, pear and flowers that swirl together harmoniously on the long and vivid finish. Keeps sailing along after the final sip. Drink now through 2020. 120 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Fleur de Lis Vineyard
review_text: Supple and open-textured, with layers of blackberry, cherry and licorice flavors, accented by hints of pepper and tea leaf. Comes together harmoniously and intensely on the polished finish. Has presence and persistence. Drink now through 2024. 169 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard La Source
review_text: Fresh and inviting, open-textured and appealing, with cherry, floral and mineral flavors gliding smoothly into a harmonious finish. Has terrific presence, depth and persistence. Drink now through 2021. 850 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains La Quercia Block
review_text: Polished, refined and light-footed, but packed with blackberry, black olive and rose petal flavors, persisting against a meaty note as the finish lingers expressively. Drink now through 2023. 300 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Carter Vineyard
review_text: Endowed with layers of ripe plum, dark berry, dried flowers and savory, meaty nuances, this medium-weight wine has tremendous presence and harmony, right through the long and expressive finish. Best from 2017 through 2023. 1,092 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Lorna-Marie
review_text: Polished, showing a velvety texture to the deftly restrained black currant, plum, smoke and spice flavors, coming together harmoniously with a minerally streak on the precise finish. Drink now through 2023. 170 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Reserve
review_text: Fresh, focused and open-textured, layering plum, currant and crème fraîche flavors with the utmost delicacy. A light nudge of tannins underlines the impressively persistent finish. Drink now through 2023. 1,250 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Vigneto Bieze Vineyard
review_text: Bright and juicy, with tangy grapefruit notes that mingle harmoniously with the vivid cherry and raspberry flavors at the core, gliding into a polished and extended finish. Drink now through 2023. 90 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard La Source
review_text: Taut, focused, complex and immediately inviting, deftly layering pear, nectarine, citrus, loamy earth and floral aromas and flavors as the finish plays on. Shows good tension between the fruit and savory notes. Drink now through 2023. 390 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills ∑ Single Vineyard
review_text: Light and zingy, dripping with gorgeous raspberry, strawberry and floral flavors, weaving in strong mineral notes as the finish gains momentum. A hint of pepper informs the aftertaste. Drink now through 2023. 302 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Willamette Valley Aurata
review_text: Focused, showing tremendous presence, with a bright beam of pear, honey, spice and floral notes that pierces the supple texture and persists into a long and expressive finish. Drink now through 2021. 160 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Antikythera
review_text: Supple, silky and generous, with blueberry and cherry flavors. A streak of tomato leaf weaves through the transparent finish, wrapped in pillowy tannins. Drink now through 2023. 310 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Botanica
review_text: Sleek and expressive, light-footed but dark-fruited, with currant and blackberry flavors standing up to the fine tannins, black tea hints and savory notes as the finish lingers. Shows more density than most from 2013. Drink now through 2020. 519 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Estate Vineyard
review_text: Fresh, open and expressive, this offers a lively mix of cherry, raspberry, cinnamon and fresh toast flavors that mingle harmoniously on a long, detailed finish. The nubby tannins are well-integrated. Drink now through 2023. 400 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Winery Block
review_text: Open-textured, ripe and generous, delivering a range of cherry, blackberry, coffee and spice flavors that float over a thin layer of crisp tannins and persist enticingly on the finish. Best from 2017 through 2023. 225 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Bergström Vineyard
review_text: Refreshing, polished and juicy, with orange peel–accented black cherry and floral flavors, showing hints of pepper and clove. Dances against a glassy texture and lingers enticingly. The finish exhibits pizzazz and grace. Drink now through 2023. 1,200 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Les Dijonnais
review_text: Fresh and expressive, soft in texture, this offers generous flavors of cherry, raspberry and clove that linger effortlessly against velvety tannins. Drink now through 2023. 517 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley The Last Chapter
review_text: Crisp and focused, with a slight minty edge accenting the raspberry and red plum flavors, lingering on the sleek, open-textured finish. Drink now through 2020. 500 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills
review_text: Focused, light, lively and savory, with distinctive mineral notes coursing through the cherry and raspberry flavors, persisting on the finish with finesse and flair. Drink now through 2023. 1,488 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Dundee Hills Clos de Lune Vineyard
review_text: Bright and generous, with complex flavors of nectarine, grapefruit, pear and flowers that swirl together harmoniously on the long and vivid finish. Keeps sailing along after the final sip. Drink now through 2020. 120 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Fleur de Lis Vineyard
review_text: Supple and open-textured, with layers of blackberry, cherry and licorice flavors, accented by hints of pepper and tea leaf. Comes together harmoniously and intensely on the polished finish. Has presence and persistence. Drink now through 2024. 169 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard La Source
review_text: Fresh and inviting, open-textured and appealing, with cherry, floral and mineral flavors gliding smoothly into a harmonious finish. Has terrific presence, depth and persistence. Drink now through 2021. 850 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains La Quercia Block
review_text: Polished, refined and light-footed, but packed with blackberry, black olive and rose petal flavors, persisting against a meaty note as the finish lingers expressively. Drink now through 2023. 300 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Carter Vineyard
review_text: Endowed with layers of ripe plum, dark berry, dried flowers and savory, meaty nuances, this medium-weight wine has tremendous presence and harmony, right through the long and expressive finish. Best from 2017 through 2023. 1,092 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Lorna-Marie
review_text: Polished, showing a velvety texture to the deftly restrained black currant, plum, smoke and spice flavors, coming together harmoniously with a minerally streak on the precise finish. Drink now through 2023. 170 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Reserve
review_text: Fresh, focused and open-textured, layering plum, currant and crème fraîche flavors with the utmost delicacy. A light nudge of tannins underlines the impressively persistent finish. Drink now through 2023. 1,250 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Vigneto Bieze Vineyard
review_text: Bright and juicy, with tangy grapefruit notes that mingle harmoniously with the vivid cherry and raspberry flavors at the core, gliding into a polished and extended finish. Drink now through 2023. 90 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Stoller Vineyard
review_text: Light, lithe and seductively supple, with pure cherry and blackberry flavors at the center, gliding into an open texture that adds glints of pear and jasmine as the finish lingers easily. Drink now through 2022. 460 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Résonance Vineyard

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Wits' End Vineyard
review_text: Fresh and vital, with crisp tannins around a generous core of black cherry, cassis and floral notes that come together harmoniously on the long and expressive finish. Best from 2017 through 2023. 322 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Ribbon Ridge Estate

review_text: Sleek and inviting, polished and deep, with cherry, cinnamon, clove and mineral flavors that meld seamlessly and keep singing on the long and expressive finish. Drink now through 2023. 81 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Slope Single Vineyard
