review_text: Fresh and expressive, soft in texture, this offers generous flavors of cherry, raspberry and clove that linger effortlessly against velvety tannins. Drink now through 2023. 517 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley The Last Chapter
review_text: Crisp and focused, with a slight minty edge accenting the raspberry and red plum flavors, lingering on the sleek, open-textured finish. Drink now through 2020. 500 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills
review_text: Focused, light, lively and savory, with distinctive mineral notes coursing through the cherry and raspberry flavors, persisting on the finish with finesse and flair. Drink now through 2023. 1,488 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Dundee Hills Clos de Lune Vineyard
review_text: Bright and generous, with complex flavors of nectarine, grapefruit, pear and flowers that swirl together harmoniously on the long and vivid finish. Keeps sailing along after the final sip. Drink now through 2020. 120 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Fleur de Lis Vineyard
review_text: Supple and open-textured, with layers of blackberry, cherry and licorice flavors, accented by hints of pepper and tea leaf. Comes together harmoniously and intensely on the polished finish. Has presence and persistence. Drink now through 2024. 169 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard La Source
review_text: Fresh and inviting, open-textured and appealing, with cherry, floral and mineral flavors gliding smoothly into a harmonious finish. Has terrific presence, depth and persistence. Drink now through 2021. 850 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains La Quercia Block
review_text: Polished, refined and light-footed, but packed with blackberry, black olive and rose petal flavors, persisting against a meaty note as the finish lingers expressively. Drink now through 2023. 300 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Carter Vineyard
review_text: Endowed with layers of ripe plum, dark berry, dried flowers and savory, meaty nuances, this medium-weight wine has tremendous presence and harmony, right through the long and expressive finish. Best from 2017 through 2023. 1,092 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Lorna-Marie
review_text: Polished, showing a velvety texture to the deftly restrained black currant, plum, smoke and spice flavors, coming together harmoniously with a minerally streak on the precise finish. Drink now through 2023. 170 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Reserve
review_text: Fresh, focused and open-textured, layering plum, currant and crème fraîche flavors with the utmost delicacy. A light nudge of tannins underlines the impressively persistent finish. Drink now through 2023. 1,250 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Vigneto Bieze Vineyard
review_text: Bright and juicy, with tangy grapefruit notes that mingle harmoniously with the vivid cherry and raspberry flavors at the core, gliding into a polished and extended finish. Drink now through 2023. 90 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Stoller Vineyard
review_text: Light, lithe and seductively supple, with pure cherry and blackberry flavors at the center, gliding into an open texture that adds glints of pear and jasmine as the finish lingers easily. Drink now through 2022. 460 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Résonance Vineyard
review_text: Light and focused, showing distinctive subtlety. A layer of crinkly tannins underlies a pulsing core of mineral-accented cherry and red berry flavors, hinting at cinnamon as the finish lingers gently. Best from 2017 through 2023. 2,000 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Wits' End Vineyard
review_text: Fresh and vital, with crisp tannins around a generous core of black cherry, cassis and floral notes that come together harmoniously on the long and expressive finish. Best from 2017 through 2023. 322 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Ribbon Ridge Estate
review_text: Offers great presence, unfurling the blueberry, currant, plum and spice flavors on a sleek, narrowly focused frame. Finishes with snap and persistence. Drink now through 2023. 453 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Block 14 Single Vineyard
review_text: Sleek and inviting, polished and deep, with cherry, cinnamon, clove and mineral flavors that meld seamlessly and keep singing on the long and expressive finish. Drink now through 2023. 81 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Slope Single Vineyard
review_text: Rich and expressive, featuring black cherry and pepper notes set against tangy mineral flavors. Comes together smoothly as the finish gains traction, with a light bite of tannins. Drink now through 2023. 348 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Nicholas Vineyard
review_text: Supple, open-textured and inviting, with plum and currant fruit riding serenely over fine, nubby tannins and picking up black tea and pear flavors as the finish lingers. Drink now through 2023. 188 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Willamette Valley Terroir Selection
review_text: Supple, open-textured and harmonious, with orange peel–tinged pear and floral flavors on a generous frame, dancing lightly through the finish. Drink now through 2020. 1,589 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Twelve Oaks Estate
review_text: Open-textured, refreshing and distinctive, with soft-spoken black cherry, dark plum, leather and espresso flavors that come together harmoniously and gain momentum as the finish sails on. Drink now through 2023. 490 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Zena Crown
review_text: Supple, velvety and generous, layering blackberry, plum, licorice, pepper and floral flavors into an open-textured finish that lets the flavors keep singing harmoniously. Best from 2017 through 2023. 213 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley
review_text: Soft and supple, plush in texture, this open-weave style offers blueberry, red plum and thyme notes, blossoming with gentle insistence. The tannins are nicely absorbed. Drink now through 2023. 2,606 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Willamette Valley Sigrid
review_text: Generous and expressive on a frame that floats nicely, offering apricot-scented pear and spice flavors that pick up toasty notes as the finish lingers. Drink now through 2020. 1,100 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Silice
review_text: Firm in texture, this lithe bundle of black cherry, raspberry, espresso and smoke flavors comes together with integrity on the harmonious finish. Needs time to soften the tannins. Best from 2018 through 2023. 1,600 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Temperance Hill Vineyard
review_text: Light and sleek, playing cherry and blueberry flavors against a polished texture that lets the finish gain momentum and persist impressively. A classic example of getting the most out of a light vintage. Drink now through 2021. 290 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Pelos Sandberg Vineyard
review_text: Fresh and sleek, with nubby tannins underlying the cherry and blueberry flavors, mingling harmoniously as the finish lingers. Drink now through 2022. 303 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Edward
review_text: Supple, complex and complete, with a harmonious array of cherry, orange peel, black tea and gentle spice flavors that come together smoothly against refined tannins on the long finish. Drink now through 2021. 100 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Cuvée du Tonnelier
review_text: Vibrant, focused, open-textured and distinctive, with savory elements weaving through the cherry and crème fraîche flavors, extending smoothly into a long finish. Best from 2017 through 2023. 570 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Ridgecrest Vineyards
review_text: Bright and lively, polished in texture and light-footed, with currant and plum flavors on a sleek frame, lingering effortlessly. Drink now through 2023. 440 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Ridgecrest Vineyards Reserve
review_text: Bright, crisp, tangy and appealing, showing transparency and vibrant raspberry and strawberry flavors, layered with hints of mint and thyme blossom. Finishes with vivid presence. Drink now through 2021. 430 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Willamette Valley
review_text: Supple, expressive and elegant, with polished texture to the relatively light but intense pear, pepper and fresh cream flavors, lingering effectively. Has depth and presence. Drink now through 2018. 50 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Dundee Hills Récolte Grand Cru
review_text: Open-textured, broad and expressive, with zingy citrus and silvery tinges to the pear and mineral flavors, lingering on the zippy finish. Drink now through 2021. 257 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Grace Vineyard
review_text: Supple and generous, this is light-footed, with black cherry, orange peel, tea and spice flavors set against well-mannered tannins. Persistent on the long finish. Best from 2018 through 2023. 321 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Leland
review_text: Refined, with an open texture to the delicately precise red plum, raspberry, white chocolate and floral flavors, gliding elegantly into a long and expressive finish. Has presence and impressive length. Drink now through 2023. 554 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard
review_text: Crisp and tangy, with a mineral character running through the raspberry and cherry flavors at the core, coming together with harmony and structural tension on the vibrant finish. Best from 2017 through 2023. 3,054 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge The Upper Terrace
review_text: Intensely and seductively aromatic, billowing purple plum, blueberry, blackberry and espresso notes that resolve on the velvety palate. The tension between the fruity and savory character persists into the long and vivid finish. Drink now through 2023. 366 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge The Beaux Frères Vineyard
review_text: With a delicate and open texture, this shows lanolin and rose petal undertones to the red berry flavors. Gains depth with each sip.—Non-blind Beaux Frères vertical (October 2015). Drink now through 2025. 2,167 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Le Pré Du Col Vineyard
review_text: Supple, seductive and distinctive, with pure blueberry fruit, shaded with white pepper, pear skin and floral character. The flavors dance merrily into the long, deftly balanced finish. Offers presence and intensity without extra weight. Drink now through 2023. 1,500 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard Summum
review_text: Taut, focused and juicy, with lemon, lemon verbena and mineral overtones to the lithe, lively, open-textured pear and apple flavors, which linger expressively as the finish floats on. Drink now through 2023. 288 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Ceras
review_text: Sleek, transparent and immensely appealing, with an open texture, delicate structure and harmony, persisting on the finish, displaying dark berry, orange peel, black tea and loamy earth complexity. The finish sails on. Drink now through 2023. 949 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Dundee Hills
review_text: Broad, open-textured and layered, with pear, grapefruit, quince and spice flavors that just don't quit as the tangy finish sails on. Has depth and distinctiveness. Drink now through 2021. 225 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Sunnyside Vineyard
review_text: This is supple, complex and harmonious, weaving together savory spice and autumn leaf overtones with ripe currant and black plum flavors. Open-textured and seductive, this unfurls gracefully through the long finish. Drink now through 2023. 211 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard La Source
review_text: Taut, focused, complex and immediately inviting, deftly layering pear, nectarine, citrus, loamy earth and floral aromas and flavors as the finish plays on. Shows good tension between the fruit and savory notes. Drink now through 2023. 390 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills ∑ Single Vineyard
review_text: Light and zingy, dripping with gorgeous raspberry, strawberry and floral flavors, weaving in strong mineral notes as the finish gains momentum. A hint of pepper informs the aftertaste. Drink now through 2023. 302 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Willamette Valley Aurata
review_text: Focused, showing tremendous presence, with a bright beam of pear, honey, spice and floral notes that pierces the supple texture and persists into a long and expressive finish. Drink now through 2021. 160 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Antikythera
review_text: Supple, silky and generous, with blueberry and cherry flavors. A streak of tomato leaf weaves through the transparent finish, wrapped in pillowy tannins. Drink now through 2023. 310 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Botanica
review_text: Sleek and expressive, light-footed but dark-fruited, with currant and blackberry flavors standing up to the fine tannins, black tea hints and savory notes as the finish lingers. Shows more density than most from 2013. Drink now through 2020. 519 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Estate Vineyard
review_text: Fresh, open and expressive, this offers a lively mix of cherry, raspberry, cinnamon and fresh toast flavors that mingle harmoniously on a long, detailed finish. The nubby tannins are well-integrated. Drink now through 2023. 400 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Winery Block
review_text: Open-textured, ripe and generous, delivering a range of cherry, blackberry, coffee and spice flavors that float over a thin layer of crisp tannins and persist enticingly on the finish. Best from 2017 through 2023. 225 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Bergström Vineyard
review_text: Refreshing, polished and juicy, with orange peel–accented black cherry and floral flavors, showing hints of pepper and clove. Dances against a glassy texture and lingers enticingly. The finish exhibits pizzazz and grace. Drink now through 2023. 1,200 cases made.

review_text: Bright, crisp, tangy and appealing, showing transparency and vibrant raspberry and strawberry flavors, layered with hints of mint and thyme blossom. Finishes with vivid presence. Drink now through 2021. 430 cases made.

review_text: Supple, expressive and elegant, with polished texture to the relatively light but intense pear, pepper and fresh cream flavors, lingering effectively. Has depth and presence. Drink now through 2018. 50 cases made.

review_text: Open-textured, broad and expressive, with zingy citrus and silvery tinges to the pear and mineral flavors, lingering on the zippy finish. Drink now through 2021. 257 cases made.

review_text: Supple and generous, this is light-footed, with black cherry, orange peel, tea and spice flavors set against well-mannered tannins. Persistent on the long finish. Best from 2018 through 2023. 321 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Leland
review_text: Refined, with an open texture to the delicately precise red plum, raspberry, white chocolate and floral flavors, gliding elegantly into a long and expressive finish. Has presence and impressive length. Drink now through 2023. 554 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard
review_text: Crisp and tangy, with a mineral character running through the raspberry and cherry flavors at the core, coming together with harmony and structural tension on the vibrant finish. Best from 2017 through 2023. 3,054 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard La Source
review_text: Seductive, silky and supple, this red layers its gorgeous currant, plum, blueberry and spice flavors on a lithe frame, coming together harmoniously on the long, expressive finish. Drink now through 2022. 1,176 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge The Upper Terrace
review_text: Sleek, silky and expressive, full-bodied but not heavy, polished to bring out the glow of the cherry, raspberry sassafras and cinnamon flavors that just won't quit as the finish sails on. Has depth, wrapped in satiny tannins, and real harmony. Best from 2015 through 2024. 579 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard La Source
review_text: Fresh, elegant and expressive, with a lovely open texture that lets the spicy, minerally pear and pineapple flavors glow brightly as the finish gains momentum. Has depth and sinuous shape. Drink now through 2020. 350 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard Summum
review_text: Bright and vibrant, this is dazzling with its depth of pear, tangerine cream and pineapple flavors, plus a cascade of mineral aromatics that tumble through the very long finish. This has intensity on a relatively light frame, and then backs off and lets the flavors coast for what seems like minutes. Drink now through 2025. 300 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard
review_text: Sleek and silky, brimming with raspberry, blackberry, pear and licorice flavors that come together seamlessly on the long, polished finish. This has depth and presence. Drink now through 2022. 3,149 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Quarter Mile Lane Vineyard
review_text: Fresh and vibrant, bursting with currant, plum and boysenberry fruit, gently wrapped in sandy tannins. Remains lively, showcasing acidity and expressive flavors as the finish lingers. Drink now through 2022. 60 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Signature
review_text: Sleek, open-textured and appealing, with satiny-smooth raspberry, cranberry and guava flavors, dancing lightly through the long, delicate and satisfying finish, interrupted only by slightly raspy tannins. Drink now through 2022. 330 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge The Beaux Frères Vineyard
review_text: This has tremendous presence and persistence. Focused and expressive, rich in texture and brimming with black cherry, plum, espresso and white pepper flavors that don't quit as the finish rolls on. The tannins are well-integrated, letting the flavors pop. Best from 2015 through 2024. 1,340 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Winery Block
review_text: Vibrant, expressive and dense, featuring cherry and currant fruit pushing against the powdery tannins. Intense but far from weighty, with hints of mineral, smoke and pepper darting in and out. Complex. Best from 2016 through 2022. 264 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Bergström Vineyard
review_text: Complex and harmonious, beautifully balancing the red cherry, raspberry and dark plum flavors against hints of tea leaf, espresso and river stones, coming together smoothly and easily. The expressive finish rolls on and on. Best from 2015 through 2024. 1,203 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Flat Block
review_text: Glass-smooth and polished, brimming with boysenberry, plum, rhubarb pie and exotic spice flavors, coming together into a taut, medium-weight and expressive finish, persisting impressively. Drink now through 2022. 245 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Willamette Valley
review_text: This is brilliantly focused, tangy and balanced, offering towering flavors of pear, pineapple, cream and floral on a pinpoint of acidity, broadening into an expressive, explosive finish. Delivers tremendous precision, persistence and expression. Drink now through 2020. 246 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley
review_text: Vibrant and intense, pulsing with mint-edged raspberry and spice flavors that ride easily over velvety tannins and persist on the refined, gently minerally finish. Drink now through 2022. 784 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley
review_text: Supple, expressive, multilayered and harmonious, this teems with ripe currant, plum and blueberry fruit, weaving in espresso, cream and nutmeg notes as the finish expands against polished tannins. Drink now through 2022. 248 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Evelyn's
review_text: Focused, juicy, precise and expressive, offering a gorgeously balanced mouthful of plum, currant, red berry and floral notes that come together harmoniously and persist on the long finish. Shows depth and distinction. Best from 2016 through 2022. 480 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Mineral Springs Ranch
review_text: Vibrant, expressive and multi layered, offering black cherry, red plum, sassafras and dead leaf flavors on a long and silky frame. The tannins are submerged, allowing the gorgeous flavors to float through the finish. Drink now through 2022. 1,500 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Helen's
review_text: Polished, round and seductive, this open-textured version brims with blackberry, cherry and plum flavors that take off and soar over the long finish. Offers depth and presence, finishing with elegance. Drink now through 2025. 350 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Boulder Bluff Vineyard
review_text: Broad and spicy, with a strong streak of minerality to underpin the ripe black cherry, dark plum, tobacco and spice flavors that expand and extend into the long, vibrant finish. Offers density and transparency, a rare combination. Drink now through 2022. 445 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Ribbon Springs Vineyard

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Helen's
review_text: Polished, round and seductive, this open-textured version brims with blackberry, cherry and plum flavors that take off and soar over the long finish. Offers depth and presence, finishing with elegance. Drink now through 2025. 350 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Boulder Bluff Vineyard
review_text: Broad and spicy, with a strong streak of minerality to underpin the ripe black cherry, dark plum, tobacco and spice flavors that expand and extend into the long, vibrant finish. Offers density and transparency, a rare combination. Drink now through 2022. 445 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Ribbon Springs Vineyard
review_text: Full-bodied and expressive, layering ripe blackberry, dark plum, green olive and spice flavors onto a supple frame, persisting on the long and expansive finish. This has presence, with fine tannins that don't get in the way. Drink now through 2022. 411 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Archer's Edge Estate
review_text: Lively and inviting, with lavish fruit character and a mouthful of blackberry, boysenberry and black cherry flavors. Set on a lithe, open-textured frame, this picks up hints of spice and verbena as the finish lingers. The tannins are well-contained. Drink now through 2022. 493 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Armstrong Vineyard
review_text: Focused, with great presence to the spicy, peppery blackberry and cherry flavors, splayed over a polished frame and lingering on the expressive finish. Deep and persistent. Drink now through 2022. 135 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Silice
review_text: Supple, complex and harmonious, offering a multilayered mouthful of cherry, plum, black tea, orange flower and warm stone flavors, all coming together on the closely woven, finely tannic finish, persisting expressively. Best from 2016 through 2022. 1,660 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills West Block
review_text: Fleshy, open-textured and light on its feet, with pretty strawberry and tomato leaf flavors that widen into red plum and spice elements as the finish expands and lengthens. Drink now through 2022. 95 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Illahe Vineyards
review_text: Firm and focused, in an expansive style, this light-footed version melds black currant, plum and delicate spice flavors into a mouthfilling package that floats through the long finish. Drink now through 2022. 113 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Cattrall Brothers Vineyard
review_text: Bright, focused and generous, with red berry, cinnamon and plum flavors, playing harmoniously on a vivid, lively canvas. Offers presence, elegance and refreshing lift on the finish. Drink now through 2022. 161 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Shea Vineyard
review_text: Taut, focused, light, lively and inviting, with pepper and clove accents around a vivid core of cherry and raspberry fruit, dancing easily through the long and expressive finish. Drink now through 2022. 175 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Basalt Block
review_text: Taut, tart and vividly expressive, bursting with red berry flavors and overtones of spice and tomato leaf. The finish persists with relish and clear minerality. Needs time to settle, but has plenty to offer. Best from 2016 through 2022. 775 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley 00 Hyland
review_text: Firm in texture and a bit tart. Despite featuring a raw edge to the cherry and cinnamon flavors at the center, this has waves of minerality on the remarkably harmonious and open-textured finish. Cascading with subtle elements, this gains depth and complexity with every sip. Best from 2017 through 2025. 25 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Adriane
review_text: Distinctly spicy and peppery, this is layered, complex and harmonious, with generous cherry and floral flavors on an open-weave frame. The tannins are well-submerged in the mix, and the finish echoes beautifully. Drink now through 2022. 1,096 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Victoria
review_text: Open-textured, expressive and precise, layering black cherry, clove, tea leaf and floral flavors on a gentle frame, gliding into a long and harmonious finish. Elegant and intense. Drink now through 2022. 368 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley
review_text: Supple, ripe and expressive, unfurling ripe blueberry, plum and spice flavors on a bed of velvety tannins. Finishes with persistence and elegance. Drink now through 2022. 1,500 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Dundee Hills Édition Limitée
review_text: Taut, with a raw edge to the vibrant Bosc pear, white nectarine and mineral flavors—a profile that would be familiar to those who like Meursault. The elements meld seamlessly on the long and expressive finish. Best from 2016 through 2022. 149 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Jerusalem Hill Vineyard
review_text: Supple, velvety and focused, aiming the cherry, currant and floral flavors through a veil of fine tannins into the long and expressive finish. Offers presence, deftness and elegance. Drink now through 2022. 434 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Lazy River Vineyard
review_text: Polished, refreshing and expressive, layered with peppermint accents that run through the black cherry and spice flavors. Presents a plush frame, showing transparency and persistence as the finish lingers. Best from 2017 through 2025. 372 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Five Mountain
review_text: Vibrant, spicy and minerally, with crushed-gravel overtones to the dark berry, black cherry and cocoa flavors, persisting easily against fine tannins on the long, expressive and open finish. Best from 2016 through 2022. 532 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Mount Richmond
review_text: Broad and expressive, not heavy but dense, with cherry, black plum and rose petal flavors that soar over refined tannins into the long and harmonious finish. Best from 2015 through 2022. 793 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge
review_text: Ripe, round and expressive, not weighty but intense and complex, layering dark berry and plum fruit with wax and mineral nuances. Finishes with a hint of root beer, showing power and finesse. Drink now through 2022. 405 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills 44º Zena Crown Vineyard
review_text: Ripe and expressive, plush and generous, offering plum at the core and savory spice nuances around the edges. Finishes with intensity, roundness and flair. Drink now through 2022. 102 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Bayliss-Bower Vineyard
review_text: This supple red is seductive and spirited, bulging with blueberry, plum and cherry flavors on a richly detailed frame, gliding into the long, expressive and open-textured finish, showing tremendous presence and depth. Drink now through 2022. 390 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District McCrone Vineyard
review_text: Lithe, open-textured and inviting, with peach and mango overtones to the black cherry and floral flavors, coming together harmoniously and finishing with a hint of wet gravel that lends a savory character to the long finish. Drink now through 2022. 480 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Savoya Vineyard
review_text: Sleek, polished and inviting for its vivid range of mineral-accented cherry, toast, licorice and spice flavors that float easily over a generous frame, finishing long and especially harmonious. A hint of orange peel and tea leaf adds a mature note. Drink now through 2022. 923 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Lange Estate Vineyard
review_text: Plush and generous, light-footed but expansive, with a hint of crème brûlée to the plum, currant and spice flavors that take off and float through the long, enticing finish. The tannins are well-absorbed. Drink now through 2022. 350 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley The Attaché
review_text: This focused red features lively blackberry, floral and white pepper flavors that unfurl in layers, persisting with finesse against an underlying mineral note as the finish revs up. Complex and expressive. Drink now through 2022. 500 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Anna's Vineyard
review_text: Firm, with ripe blackberry and mineral flavors popping through the refined tannins, extending into the long, expressive, tar-accented finish. Best from 2016 through 2022. 301 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Lorna-Marie
review_text: This open-textured, inviting and focused red layers ripe currant, blueberry and spice flavors on a well-mannered frame, coming together harmoniously on the long and expressive finish. Stylish and impressive. Best from 2016 through 2022. 200 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Pas De Nom
review_text: Light on its feet, offering rich black cherry and smoky flavors that turn sweet and spicy on the polished finish. Deep and deft, with a finish that doesn't quit. Best from 2015 through 2020. 250 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Chehalem Mountains Aurora
review_text: Taut, focused and expressive, aligning vibrant pear, Winesap apple and mineral flavors into a brilliant beam that picks up hints of clove and tomato leaf as the finish gains momentum. Seamless and elegant. Drink now through 2020. 125 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir McMinnville Meredith Mitchell Vineyard
review_text: Fresh and vital, with juicy blackberry and boysenberry flavors on a mint-accented frame. Taut, focused and very long. Has presence and impressive definition. Drink now through 2022. 200 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley The Stalker
review_text: Sleek and racy, with vibrant notes of black cherry, dark plum and earthy spice playing against fine tannins and lively acidity. Mineral and maple syrup aromatics add to the finish. Drink now through 2022. 324 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Olson Vineyard Old Vine Reserve
review_text: Crisp, focused and appealing, with juicy cherry, spice and wet rock flavors, persisting with little resistance from the tannins through a long and distinctive finish. Offers depth and lively structure. Best from 2016 through 2022. 50 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard La Source
review_text: Seductive, silky and supple, this red layers its gorgeous currant, plum, blueberry and spice flavors on a lithe frame, coming together harmoniously on the long, expressive finish. Drink now through 2022. 1,176 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge The Upper Terrace
review_text: Sleek, silky and expressive, full-bodied but not heavy, polished to bring out the glow of the cherry, raspberry sassafras and cinnamon flavors that just won't quit as the finish sails on. bottle_name: Chardonnay Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard La Source
review_text: Fresh, elegant and expressive, with a lovely open texture that lets the spicy, minerally pear and pineapple flavors glow brightly as the finish gains momentum. Has depth and sinuous shape. Drink now through 2020. 350 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard Summum

bottle_name: Chardonnay Willamette Valley
review_text: This is brilliantly focused, tangy and balanced, offering towering flavors of pear, pineapple, cream and floral on a pinpoint of acidity, broadening into an expressive, explosive finish. Delivers tremendous precision, persistence and expression. Drink now through 2020. 246 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley
review_text: Vibrant and intense, pulsing with mint-edged raspberry and spice flavors that ride easily over velvety tannins and persist on the refined, gently minerally finish. Drink now through 2022. 784 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley
review_text: Supple, expressive, multilayered and harmonious, this teems with ripe currant, plum and blueberry fruit, weaving in espresso, cream and nutmeg notes as the finish expands against polished tannins. Drink now through 2022. 248 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Evelyn's
review_text: Focused, juicy, precise and expressive, offering a gorgeously balanced mouthful of plum, currant, red berry and floral notes that come together harmoniously and persist on the long finish. Shows depth and distinction. Best from 2016 through 2022. 480 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Mineral Springs Ranch
review_text: Vibrant, expressive and multi layered, offering black cherry, red plum, sassafras and dead leaf flavors on a long and silky frame. The tannins are submerged, allowing the gorgeous flavors to float through the finish. Drink now through 2022. 1,500 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Helen's
review_text: Polished, round and seductive, this open-textured version brims with blackberry, cherry and plum flavors that take off and soar over the long finish. Offers depth and presence, finishing with elegance. Drink now through 2025. 350 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Boulder Bluff Vineyard
review_text: Broad and spicy, with a strong streak of minerality to underpin the ripe black cherry, dark plum, tobacco and spice flavors that expand and extend into the long, vibrant finish. Offers density and transparency, a rare combination. Drink now through 2022. 445 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Ribbon Springs Vineyard
review_text: Full-bodied and expressive, layering ripe blackberry, dark plum, green olive and spice flavors onto a supple frame, persisting on the long and expansive finish. This has presence, with fine tannins that don't get in the way. Drink now through 2022. 411 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Archer's Edge Estate
review_text: Lively and inviting, with lavish fruit character and a mouthful of blackberry, boysenberry and black cherry flavors. Set on a lithe, open-textured frame, this picks up hints of spice and verbena as the finish lingers. The tannins are well-contained. Drink now through 2022. 493 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Armstrong Vineyard
review_text: Focused, with great presence to the spicy, peppery blackberry and cherry flavors, splayed over a polished frame and lingering on the expressive finish. Deep and persistent. Drink now through 2022. 135 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Silice
review_text: Supple, complex and harmonious, offering a multilayered mouthful of cherry, plum, black tea, orange flower and warm stone flavors, all coming together on the closely woven, finely tannic finish, persisting expressively. Best from 2016 through 2022. 1,660 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills West Block
review_text: Fleshy, open-textured and light on its feet, with pretty strawberry and tomato leaf flavors that widen into red plum and spice elements as the finish expands and lengthens. Drink now through 2022. 95 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Illahe Vineyards
review_text: Firm and focused, in an expansive style, this light-footed version melds black currant, plum and delicate spice flavors into a mouthfilling package that floats through the long finish. Drink now through 2022. 113 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Cattrall Brothers Vineyard
review_text: Bright, focused and generous, with red berry, cinnamon and plum flavors, playing harmoniously on a vivid, lively canvas. Offers presence, elegance and refreshing lift on the finish. Drink now through 2022. 161 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Shea Vineyard
review_text: Taut, focused, light, lively and inviting, with pepper and clove accents around a vivid core of cherry and raspberry fruit, dancing easily through the long and expressive finish. Drink now through 2022. 175 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Basalt Block
review_text: Taut, tart and vividly expressive, bursting with red berry flavors and overtones of spice and tomato leaf. The finish persists with relish and clear minerality. Needs time to settle, but has plenty to offer. Best from 2016 through 2022. 775 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley 00 Hyland
review_text: Firm in texture and a bit tart. Despite featuring a raw edge to the cherry and cinnamon flavors at the center, this has waves of minerality on the remarkably harmonious and open-textured finish. Cascading with subtle elements, this gains depth and complexity with every sip. Best from 2017 through 2025. 25 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Adriane
review_text: Distinctly spicy and peppery, this is layered, complex and harmonious, with generous cherry and floral flavors on an open-weave frame. The tannins are well-submerged in the mix, and the finish echoes beautifully. Drink now through 2022. 1,096 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Victoria
review_text: Open-textured, expressive and precise, layering black cherry, clove, tea leaf and floral flavors on a gentle frame, gliding into a long and harmonious finish. Elegant and intense. Drink now through 2022. 368 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley
review_text: Supple, ripe and expressive, unfurling ripe blueberry, plum and spice flavors on a bed of velvety tannins. Finishes with persistence and elegance. Drink now through 2022. 1,500 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Dundee Hills Édition Limitée
review_text: Taut, with a raw edge to the vibrant Bosc pear, white nectarine and mineral flavors—a profile that would be familiar to those who like Meursault. The elements meld seamlessly on the long and expressive finish. Best from 2016 through 2022. 149 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Jerusalem Hill Vineyard
review_text: Supple, velvety and focused, aiming the cherry, currant and floral flavors through a veil of fine tannins into the long and expressive finish. Offers presence, deftness and elegance. Drink now through 2022. 434 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Lazy River Vineyard
review_text: Polished, refreshing and expressive, layered with peppermint accents that run through the black cherry and spice flavors. Presents a plush frame, showing transparency and persistence as the finish lingers. Best from 2017 through 2025. 372 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Five Mountain
review_text: Vibrant, spicy and minerally, with crushed-gravel overtones to the dark berry, black cherry and cocoa flavors, persisting easily against fine tannins on the long, expressive and open finish. Best from 2016 through 2022. 532 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Mount Richmond
review_text: Broad and expressive, not heavy but dense, with cherry, black plum and rose petal flavors that soar over refined tannins into the long and harmonious finish. Best from 2015 through 2022. 793 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge
review_text: Ripe, round and expressive, not weighty but intense and complex, layering dark berry and plum fruit with wax and mineral nuances. Finishes with a hint of root beer, showing power and finesse. Drink now through 2022. 405 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills 44º Zena Crown Vineyard
review_text: Ripe and expressive, plush and generous, offering plum at the core and savory spice nuances around the edges. Finishes with intensity, roundness and flair. Drink now through 2022. 102 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Bayliss-Bower Vineyard
review_text: This supple red is seductive and spirited, bulging with blueberry, plum and cherry flavors on a richly detailed frame, gliding into the long, expressive and open-textured finish, showing tremendous presence and depth. Drink now through 2022. 390 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District McCrone Vineyard
review_text: Lithe, open-textured and inviting, with peach and mango overtones to the black cherry and floral flavors, coming together harmoniously and finishing with a hint of wet gravel that lends a savory character to the long finish. Drink now through 2022. 480 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Savoya Vineyard
review_text: Sleek, polished and inviting for its vivid range of mineral-accented cherry, toast, licorice and spice flavors that float easily over a generous frame, finishing long and especially harmonious. A hint of orange peel and tea leaf adds a mature note. Drink now through 2022. 923 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Lange Estate Vineyard
review_text: Plush and generous, light-footed but expansive, with a hint of crème brûlée to the plum, currant and spice flavors that take off and float through the long, enticing finish. The tannins are well-absorbed. Drink now through 2022. 350 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley The Attaché
review_text: This focused red features lively blackberry, floral and white pepper flavors that unfurl in layers, persisting with finesse against an underlying mineral note as the finish revs up. Complex and expressive. Drink now through 2022. 500 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Anna's Vineyard
review_text: Firm, with ripe blackberry and mineral flavors popping through the refined tannins, extending into the long, expressive, tar-accented finish. Best from 2016 through 2022. 301 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Lorna-Marie
review_text: This open-textured, inviting and focused red layers ripe currant, blueberry and spice flavors on a well-mannered frame, coming together harmoniously on the long and expressive finish. Stylish and impressive. Best from 2016 through 2022. 200 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Pas De Nom
review_text: Light on its feet, offering rich black cherry and smoky flavors that turn sweet and spicy on the polished finish. Deep and deft, with a finish that doesn't quit. Best from 2015 through 2020. 250 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Chehalem Mountains Aurora
review_text: Taut, focused and expressive, aligning vibrant pear, Winesap apple and mineral flavors into a brilliant beam that picks up hints of clove and tomato leaf as the finish gains momentum. Seamless and elegant. Drink now through 2020. 125 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir McMinnville Meredith Mitchell Vineyard
review_text: Fresh and vital, with juicy blackberry and boysenberry flavors on a mint-accented frame. Taut, focused and very long. Has presence and impressive definition. Drink now through 2022. 200 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley The Stalker
review_text: Sleek and racy, with vibrant notes of black cherry, dark plum and earthy spice playing against fine tannins and lively acidity. Mineral and maple syrup aromatics add to the finish. Drink now through 2022. 324 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Olson Vineyard Old Vine Reserve
review_text: Crisp, focused and appealing, with juicy cherry, spice and wet rock flavors, persisting with little resistance from the tannins through a long and distinctive finish. Offers depth and lively structure. Best from 2016 through 2022. 50 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard La Source
review_text: Seductive, silky and supple, this red layers its gorgeous currant, plum, blueberry and spice flavors on a lithe frame, coming together harmoniously on the long, expressive finish. Drink now through 2022. 1,176 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge The Upper Terrace
review_text: Sleek, silky and expressive, full-bodied but not heavy, polished to bring out the glow of the cherry, raspberry sassafras and cinnamon flavors that just won't quit as the finish sails on. Has depth, wrapped in satiny tannins, and real harmony. Best from 2015 through 2024. 579 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard La Source
review_text: Fresh, elegant and expressive, with a lovely open texture that lets the spicy, minerally pear and pineapple flavors glow brightly as the finish gains momentum. Has depth and sinuous shape. Drink now through 2020. 350 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard Summum
review_text: Bright and vibrant, this is dazzling with its depth of pear, tangerine cream and pineapple flavors, plus a cascade of mineral aromatics that tumble through the very long finish. bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard
review_text: Sleek and silky, brimming with raspberry, blackberry, pear and licorice flavors that come together seamlessly on the long, polished finish. This has depth and presence. Drink now through 2022. 3,149 cases made.

review_text: Vibrant, expressive and dense, featuring cherry and currant fruit pushing against the powdery tannins. Intense but far from weighty, with hints of mineral, smoke and pepper darting in and out. Complex. Best from 2016 through 2022. 264 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Bergström Vineyard
review_text: Complex and harmonious, beautifully balancing the red cherry, raspberry and dark plum flavors against hints of tea leaf, espresso and river stones, coming together smoothly and easily. The expressive finish rolls on and on. Best from 2015 through 2024. 1,203 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard
review_text: Sleek and silky, brimming with raspberry, blackberry, pear and licorice flavors that come together seamlessly on the long, polished finish. This has depth and presence. Drink now through 2022. 3,149 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Quarter Mile Lane Vineyard
review_text: Fresh and vibrant, bursting with currant, plum and boysenberry fruit, gently wrapped in sandy tannins. Remains lively, showcasing acidity and expressive flavors as the finish lingers. Drink now through 2022. 60 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Signature
review_text: Sleek, open-textured and appealing, with satiny-smooth raspberry, cranberry and guava flavors, dancing lightly through the long, delicate and satisfying finish, interrupted only by slightly raspy tannins. Drink now through 2022. 330 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge The Beaux Frères Vineyard

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Winery Block

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Bergström Vineyard
review_text: Complex and harmonious, beautifully balancing the red cherry, raspberry and dark plum flavors against hints of tea leaf, espresso and river stones, coming together smoothly and easily. The expressive finish rolls on and on. Best from 2015 through 2024. 1,203 cases made.

review_text: Glass-smooth and polished, brimming with boysenberry, plum, rhubarb pie and exotic spice flavors, coming together into a taut, medium-weight and expressive finish, persisting impressively. Drink now through 2022. 245 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Willamette Valley
review_text: This is brilliantly focused, tangy and balanced, offering towering flavors of pear, pineapple, cream and floral on a pinpoint of acidity, broadening into an expressive, explosive finish. Delivers tremendous precision, persistence and expression. Drink now through 2020. 246 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley
review_text: Vibrant and intense, pulsing with mint-edged raspberry and spice flavors that ride easily over velvety tannins and persist on the refined, gently minerally finish. Drink now through 2022. 784 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard La Source
review_text: Fresh, elegant and expressive, with a lovely open texture that lets the spicy, minerally pear and pineapple flavors glow brightly as the finish gains momentum. Has depth and sinuous shape. Drink now through 2020. 350 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard Summum
review_text: Bright and vibrant, this is dazzling with its depth of pear, tangerine cream and pineapple flavors, plus a cascade of mineral aromatics that tumble through the very long finish. This has intensity on a relatively light frame, and then backs off and lets the flavors coast for what seems like minutes. Drink now through 2025. 300 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard
review_text: Sleek and silky, brimming with raspberry, blackberry, pear and licorice flavors that come together seamlessly on the long, polished finish. This has depth and presence. Drink now through 2022. 3,149 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Evelyn's

bottle_name: Chardonnay Willamette Valley Inox Unoaked
review_text: A dynamic white, with spirited lemon and lime flavors that sail on the crisp, vibrant and steely finish. Drink now. 9,100 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Gris Willamette Valley
review_text: Luscious yet crisp and refreshing, with lively apricot, fresh fig and spice flavors that finish on a polished note. Drink now. 7,711 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Oregon
review_text: A delicious quaff, this white is a fruit bomb of tropical fruit, pear and spice, finishing on a supple yet crisp note. Drink now. 50,000 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Gris Willamette Valley
review_text: Fleshy and polished, with supple pear, fresh fig and cinnamon flavors that end on a rich accent. Drink now. 10,656 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Gris Willamette Valley
review_text: Sleek and delicate yet vibrant, with jasmine flower, pear and lemon flavors that glide on the supple finish. Drink now. 31,000 cases made.

bottle_name: Rosé Oregon
review_text: Presents pretty violet and strawberry aromas that open to succulent, fruit-forward cherry flavors. Sangiovese, Syrah, Zinfandel, Tempranillo and Malbec. Drink now. 12,500 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Oregon
review_text: Easygoing, with pineapple and peach flavors that finish on a spicy, sweet accent. Drink now. 3,107 cases made.

bottle_name: Grenache Rogue Valley Rosé
review_text: A lively blush, with snappy raspberry and peach flavors that finish on a spicy note. Drink now. 1,700 cases made.

bottle_name: Rosé Oregon
review_text: Juicy and easygoing, with raspberry and toasty spice flavors. Drink now. 6,900 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Rosé
review_text: Sleek and snappy, with expressive strawberry and watermelon flavors. Drink now. 4,000 cases made.

bottle_name: Riesling Oregon
review_text: A fun quaff, a touch sweet yet appealing for the ripe pear, cantaloupe and cinnamon accents. Drink now. 32,300 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Gris Willamette Valley
review_text: Delicate and pretty, with green apple and citrus blossom accents. Drink now. 2,980 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Rosé
review_text: Delicate and soft, with strawberry and peach flavors. Drink now. 2,860 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Rosé
review_text: Pretty and delicate, with floral strawberry and peach flavors. Drink now. 13,850 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Gris Oregon
review_text: Soft and fruit-forward, with lemon verbena and peach sorbet flavors. Drink now. 85,000 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Eola-Amity Hills
review_text: Opulent and refined, with a vibrant core of acidity framed by pear, cantaloupe and toasty spice flavors that build depth and richness on the savory finish. Drink now. Tasted twice, with consistent notes. 1,557 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir McMinnville Hyland Vineyard
review_text: Elegantly structured and stylish, with vibrant raspberry, orange peel, cinnamon and other baking spices. Builds richness and tension toward refined tannins. Drink now through 2030. 300 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Dundee Hills Arthur
review_text: Expressive and delicately complex, with apple blossom, orange peel and zesty spice flavors that finish with a fresh lift of acidity. Drink now. 1,982 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge
review_text: Supple and detailed, with multilayered red plum and pomegranate flavors highlighted by tea leaf and stony minerality as this builds tension toward refined tannins. Drink now through 2030. 477 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Estate
review_text: This lovely red is elegantly complex and polished, with expressive cherry and raspberry flavors that are highlighted by orange peel and dusky spice notes and unfurl on the long, lush finish. Drink now through 2030. 2,239 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Willamette Valley Affinités
review_text: Handsomely built, with deep and multilayered flavors of tropical fruit and orange peel accented by dusky spice and hints of mineral. Drink now. 359 cases made.

bottle_name: Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton Domaine Danielle Laurent
review_text: A structured red, with a lively backbone of acidity that powers deep black raspberry, dusky spice and black tea flavors, which build toward broad-shouldered tannins. Drink now through 2030. 500 cases made.

bottle_name: Chardonnay Willamette Valley Inox Unoaked
review_text: This white bursts with aromas of peach blossom and lemon zest, taking on a lush, succulent texture toward a crisp finish. Drink now. 5,900 cases made.
